law.catch_line: Persons immune from suit for good faith conduct under KRS 17.500 to 17.580 and 17.991.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 102, effective June 26, 2007. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 4, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 401, sec. 30, effective April 11, 2000.
